sdata.e: There are many postcards in this store.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑切手↑↓きって↓のコレクションを↑持↑↓も↓ってないけど、↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の|↑葉↑↓は↓↑書|↑↓が↓きのコレクションを↑持↑↓も↓っている。それを↑口実↑↓こうじつ↓として、↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑誘↑↓さそ↓うことができると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I don't have a stamp collection, but I have a Japanese postcard collection that I could use as an excuse to invite him.

sdata.e: I don't have a stamp collection, but I have a Japanese postcard collection that I could use as an excuse to invite her.
